name: Smoked Butterscotch Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and Smoked Butterscotch sauce topped with foam and fine coffee grounds.

name: Smoked Butterscotch Frappuccino
description: Smoked Butterscotch sauce combined with coffee and milk, blended with ice. Topped with whipped cream and fine coffee grounds

name: Smoked Butterscotch Cream Frappuccino
description: Smoked Butterscotch sauce combined with milk and blended with ice. Topped with whipped cream.

name: Cocoa Chai Almond Latte
description: A delicious tea beverage having a perfect balance of tea, cocoa and spices served with the goodness of almonds.

name: Iced Cocoa Chai Almond Latte
description: A delicious, iced tea beverage having a perfect balance of tea, cocoa and spices served with the goodness of almonds.

name: Smoked Butterscotch Latte
description: Espresso with milk and Starbucks signature Smoked Butterscotch sauce served in 1 litre bottle.

name: Hazelnut Latte
description: Our signature hazelnut latte in a 1 litre bottle.

name: Iced Shaken Hibiscus & Lemonade
description: Balanced blend of hibiscus, lemongrass and apple, iced and shaken for a refreshingly vibrant flavour. Serves 4 to 5 cups.

name: Signature Chocolate
description: Four cocoa blend and chilled milk. A perfect chocolate delight.

name: Iced Vanilla Latte
description: Rich espresso, vanilla syrup and creamy milk.

name: White Mocha Caramel Cold Brew
description: Our delicious White mocha caramel cold brew in a 1 litre bottle.

name: Cold Brew
description: Freshly ground coffee steeped for 48 hours. Served over ice, unsweetened.

name: Blends & Single - Origin Coffee
description: India Estates Blend ,kenya,Sumaitra and italian roast

name: French Press
description: Retains precious natural oils and extracts full flavour

name: Pour Over
description: Delicious,clean cup,Highlights-subtle flavour notes

name: Vanilla Cream Frappuccino
description: This rich and creamy blend of vanilla, milk and ice topped with whipped cream takes vanilla flavor to another level.

name: Caramel Cream Frappuccino
description: A blend of coffee, sweet caramel syrup, milk and ice topped with whipped cream and a swirl of caramel drizzle.

name: Double Chocolate Chip Frappuccino
description: Rich mocha-flavored sauce meets up with chocolaty chips, milk and ice. Top it off with sweetened whipped cream and mocha drizzle for a real party in your mouth.

name: Mocha Frappuccino
description: Coffee with rich mocha sauce blended with milk and ice. Topped with sweetened whipped cream.

name: Strawberries & Creme Frappuccino
description: Strawberries and milk are blended with ice and topped with a swirl of whipped cream.

name: Chai Tea Cream Frappuccino
description: Tea and milk are blended with ice and topped with a swirl of whipped cream.

name: Green Tea Cream Frappuccino
description: We blend sweetened premium matcha?reen?ea, milk and ice and top it with sweetened whipped cream to give you a delicious boost of energy.

name: Caffe Mocha
description: We combine our Rich in flavour, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk. The classic coffee drink to satisfy your sweet tooth.

name: Cold Brew Black
description: We combine our Rich in flavour, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk. The classic coffee drink to satisfy your sweet tooth.

name: White Mocha Caramel Cold Brew
description: Slow steeped cold brew shaken with white chocolate and caramel flavored syrup.

name: Cold Brew Black
description: Starbucks kenya coffee is freshly ground and then steeped for 48 hours. This artisanal process results in deliciously iced coffee that is served over ice, unsweetened.

name: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
description: Cold brew with Vanilla Sweet Cream is made with starbucks cold brew over ice and topped with a house made vanilla sweet cream, which floats on top of the beverage before slowly cascading down.

name: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
description: Our blend of ice tea is slightly sweetened and hand shaken with ice for a refreshingly vibrant flavour.

name: Iced Shaken Green Tea
description: Our blend of lemongrass  is slightly sweetened and hand shaken with ice for a refreshingly vibrant flavour.

name: Iced Shaken Hibiscus & Passion Lemonade
description: Our blend of hibiscus, lemongrass and apple is slightly sweetened and hand shaken with ice for a refreshingly vibrant flavour.

name: Caffè Latte
description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam. A perfect milk forward warm up.

name: Vanilla Latte
description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with vanilla flavored syrup, steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

name: Hazelnut Latte
description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with Hazelnut flavored syrup, steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

name: Caramel Latte
description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with Caramel flavored syrup, steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

name: Cappuccino
description: Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick foam. It's truly the height of our baristas' craft.

name: Caffè Mocha
description: We combine our Rich in flavour, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk. The classic coffee drink to satisfy your sweet tooth.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup is marked with espresso and topped with caramel drizzle.

name: White Chocolate Mocha
description: Our signature espresso meets white chocolate sauce and steamed milk in this white chocolate delight.

name: Caffè Americano
description: Rich, full-bodied espresso with hot water in true European style.

name: Flat White
description: Expertly steamed milk poured over Ristretto shots of espresso and finished with a Starbucks dot.

name: Iced Latte
description: Our dark, rich espresso combined with milk and served over ice. A perfect milk-forward cooldown.

name: Iced Mocha
description: Our rich, full-bodied espresso combined with bittersweet mocha sauce, milk and ice, then topped with sweetened whipped cream.

name: Iced White Chocolate Mocha
description: A cold coffee drink made with espresso, white chocolate sauce, milk, and ice, topped off with vanilla whipped cream.

name: Iced Americano
description: Espresso shots topped with cold water produce a light layer of crema, then served over ice.

name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: A rich, full-bodied espresso with vanilla-flavoured syrup, milk and ice, then top it off with a caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish..

name: Mocha Frappuccino®
description: Coffee with rich mocha sauce blended with milk and ice. Topped with sweetened whipped cream.

name: Java Chip Frappuccino®
description: We blend mocha sauce and Frappuccino chips with frappuccino roast coffee and milk and ice, then top with whipped cream and mocha drizzle to bring you endless java joy.

name: Caramel Java Chip Frappuccino®
description: Coffee with rich mocha flavoured sauce blended with milk chocolaty chips, caramel syrup and ice. Topped with sweetened whipped cream and chocolate drizzle.

name: Caramel Frappuccino®
description: A blend of coffee, sweet caramel syrup, milk and ice topped with whipped cream and a swirl of caramel drizzle.

name: Coffee Frappuccino®
description: Coffee meets milk and ice in a blender and together they create one of our original Frappuccino.

name: Espresso Frappuccino®
description: Coffee is combined with a shot of espresso and milk, then blended with ice to give you a nice little jolt and lots of sipping joy.

name: White Mocha Frappuccino®
description: White chocolate Frappuccino is a blend of coffee, white chocolate sauce, milk and ice. Topped with sweetened whipped cream.

name: Cold Coffee Frappuccino®
description: Our rich in flavour espresso blended with delicate vanilla flavour and milk to create a perfect cold coffee delight.

name: Signature Hot Chocolate
description: Four cocoas and fresh steamed milk with whipped cream and chocolate powder.

name: English Breakfast Black Tea
description: A breakfast-style black tea of malty boldness & bright flavour, invigorating any time of the day.

name: Chai Tea Latte

name: Iced Chai Tea Latte
description: Black tea infused with cinnamon, clove, and other warming spices are combined with steamed milk for the perfect balance of sweet and spicy.

name: Green Tea Latte
description: Smooth and creamy matcha is lightly sweetened and served with steamed milk.
